paragraph1: Existence Map is a poetic framework for exploring consciousness, development, mystery, and meaning. It is not a belief system, but a mirror — one that gently reflects aspects of our evolving inner and outer worlds.
paragraph2: Inspired by Spiral Dynamics, integral theory, mysticism, and interbeing, this map seeks to orient the soul in an age of complexity. You may find patterns, resonance, contradiction — or simply a reminder that you are not alone in your wondering.
quote: This is not a map to control the world — but a mirror through which the world awakens itself.
signature: Created with love by Björn Kenneth Holmström
